alert.note: Alert for Gove; Logan; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 2:32AM CST until January 19 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM MST /MIDNIGHT CST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations ranging anywhere from 1 to 3 inches. Northerly winds at 20 to 30 mph may gust up to 40 mph at times. * WHERE...In Colorado, Cheyenne County. In Kansas, Wallace, Logan and Gove Counties. * WHEN...From 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ this afternoon to 11 PM MST /midnight CST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions can be expected late this evening into Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation may begin as rain, or a wintry mix. A short period of freezing drizzle or light freezing rain cannot be ruled out. In other words, hazardous travel conditions may exist before it begins to snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, slow down, turn off cruise control, and exercise additional caution, particularly at intersections and highway on-ramps and off-ramps where accidents are more likely to occur. Decelerating abruptly or making sharp turns at a high rate of speed may result in loss of vehicle control. Avoid sudden accelerations and decelerations. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
